title: 安装fabric后打不开
author: cuihua0
txt_content:
我新安装的游戏，游戏版本1.15.2，用hmcl下的(下载源用hmcl，mbss都试过了)，没有任何mod，只有fabric，fabric用官网安装器安装(也尝试了用hmcl安装)，正版登录，java版本:jre1.8.0_241(也尝试了jre1.8.0_201)，没有自定义参数启动，由hmcl自动分配。然后用fabric游戏打不开，但是原版打得开
以下是代码，代码中的U盘是sata硬盘，不是u盘


Command: "C:\Program Files\Java\jre1.8.0_241\bin\java.exe" -Dminecraft.client.jar=.minecraft\versions\1.15.2\1.15.2.jar -XX:+UnlockExperimentalVMOptions -XX:+UseG1GC -XX:G1NewSizePercent=20 -XX:G1ReservePercent=20 -XX:MaxGCPauseMillis=50 -XX:G1HeapRegionSize=16M -XX:-UseAdaptiveSizePolicy -XX:-OmitStackTraceInFastThrow -Xmn128m -Xmx2048m -Dfml.ignoreInvalidMinecraftCertificates=true -Dfml.ignorePatchDiscrepancies=true -XX:HeapDumpPath=MojangTricksIntelDriversForPerformance_javaw.exe_minecraft.exe.heapdump -Djava.library.path=U:\mc1.15.2\.minecraft\versions abric-loader-0.8.2+build.194-1.15.2 abric-loader-0.8.2+build.194-1.15.2-natives -Dminecraft.launcher.brand=HMCL -Dminecraft.launcher.version=3.2.149 -cp U:\mc1.15.2\.minecraft\libraries
et abricmc	iny-mappings-parser\0.2.2.14	iny-mappings-parser-0.2.2.14.jar;U:\mc1.15.2\.minecraft\libraries
et abricmc\sponge-mixin\0.8+build.18\sponge-mixin-0.8+build.18.jar;U:\mc1.15.2\.minecraft\libraries
et abricmc	iny-remapper\0.2.2.64	iny-remapper-0.2.2.64.jar;U:\mc1.15.2\.minecraft\libraries
et abricmc abric-loader-sat4j\2.3.5.4 abric-loader-sat4j-2.3.5.4.jar;U:\mc1.15.2\.minecraft\libraries\com\google\jimfs\jimfs\1.1\jimfs-1.1.jar;U:\mc1.15.2\.minecraft\libraries\org\ow2\asm\asm\8.0\asm-8.0.jar;U:\mc1.15.2\.minecraft\libraries\org\ow2\asm\asm-analysis\8.0\asm-analysis-8.0.jar;U:\mc1.15.2\.minecraft\libraries\org\ow2\asm\asm-commons\8.0\asm-commons-8.0.jar;U:\mc1.15.2\.minecraft\libraries\org\ow2\asm\asm-tree\8.0\asm-tree-8.0.jar;U:\mc1.15.2\.minecraft\libraries\org\ow2\asm\asm-util\8.0\asm-util-8.0.jar;U:\mc1.15.2\.minecraft\libraries\com\google\guava\guava\21.0\guava-21.0.jar;U:\mc1.15.2\.minecraft\libraries
et abricmc\intermediary\1.15.2\intermediary-1.15.2.jar;U:\mc1.15.2\.minecraft\libraries
et abricmc abric-loader\0.8.2+build.194 abric-loader-0.8.2+build.194.jar;U:\mc1.15.2\.minecraft\libraries\com\mojang\patchy\1.1\patchy-1.1.jar;U:\mc1.15.2\.minecraft\libraries\oshi-project\oshi-core\1.1\oshi-core-1.1.jar;U:\mc1.15.2\.minecraft\libraries
et\java\dev\jna\jna\4.4.0\jna-4.4.0.jar;U:\mc1.15.2\.minecraft\libraries

replies.author: 小孩孩
replies.txt_content:
cuihua0 发表于 2020-4-12 09:49
原版可以打开，可以玩，而且不生成crash-report
那应该是fabric的问题
试试用旧一点的fabric或者forge启动
https://www.mcbbs.net/thread-869469-1-1.html
还不行用这个整合包

replies.author: cuihua0
replies.txt_content:

有没有crash-report
没有，他没有生成
